name: Luna's Aim Trainer
description:
Train yourself to aim faster and more accurately with this Free To Play aim trainer. Early looks at it with more features on the way!

Features:
Time yourself to click the cubes as many times as possible!
Customizable user settings to make it as comfortable to your needs!

Expected Features:
- Different Shapes to hit
- Saved High Scores
- Customizable Debris
- Customizable Cubes
- More Gameplay modifiers
- (Possibly) something rhythm based?

I'm considering some user requests as well!
Either suggest in the Discord (https://discord.com/invite/z4qTFwhzeV)
or
in the comments here!

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!
